name: AFTER Z.
description:
Defend the city from the zombie invasion. 

You play as Z, a graveyard keeper who has to fend off the growing zombie hoard and protect the townsfolk. Armed with a revolver and shovel, kill and bury the dead for as long as you can. 

Once Z fails, reanimate into a Zombie and terrorize the town you were meant to protect. 

Features:

- Two Game Modes

- Zombie Combat

- Original Art

Developers:

Naimad Adrec - Programmer

Munamused - Artist/UI Programmer

Audio Credits:

Fright Night by Micheal Ramir C.

Dark Mysterious Halloween Night - Scary Creepy Spooky Horror Music by SoundGalleryBy

9mm pistol shot by michorvath
